doc.name: JAITIFFWriter
doc.description:
Write a javax.media.jai.RenderedOp to a specified TIFF file.

The file is specified by the fileName attribute using any form acceptable to FileParameter.

If the writeTiled parameter has value true, then the data will be stored in tiles. If false then the data will be stored in strips.

If the confirmOverwrite parameter has value false, then this actor will overwrite the specified file if it exists without asking. If true (the default), then if the file exists, then this actor will ask for confirmation before overwriting.
doc.author: James Yeh, Christopher Hylands Brooks
doc.property: If false (the default), then write the data in strips. This is acceptable for smaller images. If true, then write the data in tiles. This makes image access much more efficient in larger images.
